item.title: Sequential Lending ideas
item.description: Ideas sustainability and expansion depend on loan repayments, as well as on cost effectiveness (sql reduces cost). NGO coverage is higher in villages with better opportunities for productive activities (Mallick Nabin,2018). need mechanisms that allow NGO to alleviate poverty by operating in areas with lower productivity. From Mallick Nabin 2018 Microfinance organisations target non-poor without adhering to screening devices target program locations1 mission drift2 poverty alleviation implies: NGO will take the program to the locations where profit-driven financial institutions do not reach and target the poor households in a given location.
